reviewText: I would definitely recommend this tape. St Therese is an inspiration and it was a beautiful documentary on an incredible saint.. it definitely brought years to my eyes. I highly recommend it!

There's nothing like seeing the world
through the eyes of a child.
This is worthy. I haven't time to write anything,  but saw that no one had reviewed it. It is beautiful and well (intelligently) done.

Beatiful little summary of a Saint of "Our Times" who
wanted to remain small!
I only ask that you note it is a "VHS" tape,I thankfully
had one still in our bedroom.
My error for not reaading}
I absolutely Love "Our Little Flower"
and you will to!
